title: My Pixel 4a resets the Bluetooth name everytime I switch it off and switch it on.
content: My Pixel 4a resets Bluetooth to a random weird alphanumeric everytime I switch it off and on. It's weird cause when I connect to my Bluetooth devices, it says connected to 6 1 1 4 3 6 8 6 6 d. Is there a way to permanently change the Bluetooth name?
